title: This Ebola Outbreak 'Has Broken All The Rules'
teaser: Laurie Garrett covered the Ebola outbreak in Zaire in 1995. She talks with NPR's Scott Simon about the U.S. mission to send military and monetary aid to Africa to help control Ebola in the region.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
